mapper.select: SELECT eventNum, subject, content, thumbnail, TO_CHAR(regDate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AS regDate, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AS endDate, TRUNC(SYSDATE - endDate) AS deadline FROM event ORDER BY eventNum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eventReply(replyNum, eventNum, userCode, content, regDate) VALUES (eventReplyNum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{eventNum}, #{userCode}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
